name: Kamiya Kamiya Dance
description:
Kamiya Kamiya Dance

Play as both Tomoyuki and Hatsumomo, dancing in sync!

  • Use the arrow keys to dance
  • Press the Z key to switch who you're controlling:
    • Tomoyuki for yellow arrows
    • Hatsumomo for green arrows
  • Press Enter to open the menu and restart if you need to
  • Every note you hit right increases your score%
  • Also, the more accurate you are, the more stars you get, from 1 to 3
  • It's really hard! Sorry!
